Themes

Tailwind NG provides a set of pre-built themes available via the CDN and npm for your Angular application.
These themes support light and dark mode by default and are pre-built with Tailwind CSS.

Default

As you may guessed, this is the theme used by all Tailwind NG components by default.

Usage from the CDN

This is the easiest and fastest way to use a theme. As it's served by the CDN, it will no impact your app bundle size.

Add the highlighted line to your index.html file.

@if (copyRec['fromCDN']) { } @else { }

Usage from npm registry

Install the package using your favorite package manager.

npm:

@if (copyRec['npm']) { } @else { }

yarn:

@if (copyRec['yarn']) { } @else { }

pnpm:

@if (copyRec['pnpm']) { } @else { }

Add the follwing line to your main css file.

@if (copyRec['fromNPM']) { } @else { }
